params._blobstreamX: BlobstreamX contract where Celestia commitments are being stored
params._inputBox: InputBox contract to send inputs to Cartesi DApps

relayShares(address,(bytes[],(uint256,ui.details: Called by clients to securely relay Celestia data to Cartesi DApps

params._execLayerData: Additional data to be interpreted by the execution layer
params._proof: SharesProof object showing that a range of shares is committed to Celestia
params._root: The Celestia "dataRoot" with the commitment for the block that contains the shares

returns._0: The hash of the input as returned by the Cartesi DApp's input box

relayShares(address,(bytes[],(uint256,ui.notice: Relay the specified Celestia shares as an input to a DApp's input box

userdoc.notice: Relays Celestia blocks as inputs to Cartesi DApps
